about.details:
Incorporated in 2011, Novateor Research Laboratories Ltd is engaged in developing novel personal care products. The company is mainly known by its teeth whitening products which sold in the market under the brand name of SmiloShine. Their product range includes Whitening Toothbrush, Teeth Whitening Charcoal Gel Strips and Teeth Whitening Strips.

The manufacturing facility of the company is located at Sanand Taluka, Ahmedabad District. Currently, the company have its presence only in Gujrat and Maharashtra. But they also sell their products online through Amazon, Flipcart and Nykaa.com. The company is also planning to tie-up with multiple distributors, dentists and other modern retail for marketing, selling and branding their products. Their manufacturing facility has a semi-automation process which reduces manual labour and material wastage.

Novateor manufactures three different types of teeth whitening strips based on different variants. The company is also planning to extend the business in health care pharma products, speciality pharma and cosmetics in future. Company's customer base consists of well-trained Dentists.

faqs.question: What is the Smiloshine IPO?
faqs.answer:
Smiloshine IPO is a SME IPO of 1872000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.49 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹24 per share. The minimum order quantity is 6000.

The IPO opens on August 30, 2019, and closes on September 4, 2019.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Smiloshine IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Smiloshine IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Smiloshine IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Smiloshine IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Smiloshine IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Smiloshine IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Smiloshine IPO opens on August 30, 2019 and closes on September 4, 2019.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Smiloshine IPO?
faqs.answer: Smiloshine IPO lot size is 6000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,44,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Smiloshine IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Smiloshine IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Smiloshine IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Smiloshine IPO will be done on Monday, September 9, 2019, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, September 12, 2019. Check the Smiloshine IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Smiloshine IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Smiloshine IPO listing date is on Friday, September 13, 2019.
